programme.title: Paranormal Unexplained
programme.sub-title: Most Terrifying Paranormal Activity Caught On Camera - Part 2
programme.desc: We revisit this abandoned haunted coroners court! What we captured and heard was the most terrifying poltergeist activity caught on camera!

programme.title: Conspiracy
programme.desc: Conspiracy is a video documentary series that explores the dark and controversial stories behind history's most well-known conspiracies. The series aims to take a neutral position on very polarizing topics while helping viewers uncover the truth.

programme.title: Cryptid Wilds S02 E01
programme.desc: The search for Big Foot takes these two adventures into the wilderness, as they document their journey to find the mythological creature

programme.title: Paranormal Investigator
programme.sub-title: Is It HAUNTED? | I Had To Investigate
programme.desc: Danny Moss is one of the leading names in the UK paranormal field. The Paranormal Investigator documents Danny's own personal joruney into the paranormal as he attempts to document compelling evidence on camera. Danny's investigation style is based on capturing both visual & audible results, he does not believe in the use of 'spiritual' or 'easily manipulated' techniques such as Ouija Boards, Table Tipping, Mediums, Pendulums, Dowsing Rods, Mirror Scrying etc...This show is for viewers who are willing to be patient and who understand the true values of paranormal investigation. More often than not, paranormal phenomena does not occurr and Danny's ethics and reputation will ensure that what you see is a TRUE reflection of the investigations conducted.

programme.title: Encounters
programme.desc: After 5 years, Jason returns to the scene of the first location the Encounters crew ever investigated.....Bodmin Jail as his investigation of this mammoth prison alone once again, begins!

programme.title: Encounters

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Richard speaks with the pre-eminent investigators of the alleged crash of a UFO near Roswell, New Mexico in 1947. These researchers have investigated firsthand accounts, even death bed testimonials from many of the eye-witnesses to the incident, affirming the existence of such a craft, the ensuing government cover-up, and the recovery of alien bodies.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.sub-title: The Death of Princess Diana - Tragic Car Accident or Murder?
programme.desc: An investigation into the various conspiracy theories revolving around the tragic death of Diana, The People's Princess, in Paris in August 1997. Was she murdered for her work exposing the manufacturers of land mines? Was she perceived as a threat to the Royal Family? A noted British filmmaker and journalist attempts to poke holes in these theories and affirms that the former Princess of Wales died as a result of a deadly mix of speed and alcohol.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Were the Mercury, Genesis, Apollo and Space Shuttle programs mere window dressing designed for public consumption? Richard speaks with several researchers and an aerospace industry insider who all claim that there is a highly secret, parallel space program, which includes deep space platforms, possible colonies on moon and Mars, and aircraft equipped with anti-gravity technology and light-speed capability.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: The legend of the werewolf throughout history and in various cultures is explored. The Conspiracy Show travels to England and rural Wisconsin to investigate claims of actual werewolf sightings.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.sub-title: The Rise of the Fourth Reich (Nazi's in America)
programme.desc: The Allies defeated the Axis Powers on the battlefield, but did they actually win the war? Richard interviews several alternative historians who say that while the German Army may have surrendered in 1945, the Nazi's never officially did. Further, these researchers claim that dozens of high ranking Nazi scientists, intelligence officers and generals were exfiltrated into the United States through Operation Paper Clip where they were placed in powerful and highly influential positions atop the US power structure. Finally, these researchers/historians claim, these Nazi's and their descendants continue to exercise considerable influence on world events to the present day.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: A serious investigation of the long-held theory that Elvis Presley faked his death in August 1977. Jokes of Elvis sightings in Kalamazoo aside, there is a considerable volume of evidence to suggest Elvis may not have left the building. Interviews include former sheriff's department employee who believes E is still with us. An Elvis Presley historian and author argues that the King is dead.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: A short history of mind control experimentation beginning with the Nazis through to the CIA’s infamous MK Ultra program. Richard speaks with several researchers and investigators about their claims that several infamous assassins, such as Lee Harvey Oswald, Sirhan Sirhan and Mark David Chapman, were not criminally responsible for their acts, but were either programmed killers or programmed to take the fall.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Was Presidential hopeful, Robert F. Kennedy really killed by disgruntled Palestinian Sirhan Sirhan as we’ve been led to believe? Or was he another in a long line of Manchurian candidates, a victim of a long standing mind control program. Richard interviews Sirhan’s lawyer, and several researchers who affirm the evidence is crystal clear: Sirhan Sirhan did not fire the fatal shots that killed Bobby Kennedy.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: The second in a series of investigations into the phenomenon known as past life regression. Richard witnesses a municipal employee in Toronto, Canada undergo a regression during which he re-experiences a previous life as a doctor in early 20th. Century England.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Does the Bible contain hidden messages encoded within certain passages of the Old Testament? Is the prophetic nature of these 'codes' proof the Bible's author is of supernatural or extraterrestrial origin? Richard interviews several Bible Code researchers who explain why these codes are real, how they can be uncovered and decoded and what they mean for mankind.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.sub-title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Richard interviews the expedition organizer who is planning on leading a team of scientists, filmmakers and tourists to the Arctic aboard a Russian nuclear ice-breaker in search of an entrance into the interior of our world. A number of researchers provide evidence that the earth, like all planets was formed with a hollow core, and that this interior world may be home to previously unknown life including a technologically and spiritually advanced race of humanoids. A skeptical perspective is also advanced.

programme.title: The Conspiracy Show
programme.desc: Richard meets several members of the 9/11 Truth movement who challenge the official version of events concerning the attack on the U.S. Pentagon on September 11, 2001. Researchers present evidence to suggest the attack was perpetrated by some rogue element inside the U.S. government. Was it really American Airlines Flight 77 that slammed into the west wall of the Pentagon? Was it a Tomahawk missile? Was it a bomb placed inside the building?

programme.title: Encounters
programme.desc: Jason and the team continue the investigation at the scene of the first location the Encounters crew ever investigated.....Bodmin Jail as his investigation of this mammoth prison alone once again, begins!

programme.title: Paranormal Unexplained
programme.sub-title: Our Night Of Terror In Haunted Mill
programme.desc: In tonight's episode, we head out to investigate The Hauntings of Warwick Mill, where it's been reported that people who venture inside end up running out in fear due to the paranormal activity within.
